Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Schema v12 — supply chain supplier tracking, activity log, job updates, global search

Supply Chain Integrity \(Phase 1\):
- Track supplier_id through entire part lifecycle: PO → receive_log →
  truck_transfers → consumption_log → job_parts
- Enforce one-supplier-per-part-per-job rule — raises ValueError if a
  different supplier tries to supply the same part to the same job
- Auto-detect supplier on manual warehouse→truck transfers
- get_suggested_return_supplier\(\) for smart return-to-supplier workflow
- get_part_supplier_chain\(\) for full audit trail across all movements

New Features:
- Activity log \(activity_log table\) — audit trail for all user actions
- Job updates/comments system \(job_updates table\) — team communication
  with pinning, types \(comment/status_change/assignment/milestone\)
- Global search \(search_all\) across jobs, parts, users, orders, notebooks
- Office page, enhanced settings, part types/variants UI

Schema Migration v11→v12:
- truck_transfers: +source_order_id, +supplier_id columns
- job_parts: +supplier_id, +source_order_id columns
- consumption_log: +supplier_id, +source_order_id columns
- receive_log: +supplier_id column
- New tables: activity_log, job_updates
- 13 new indexes for performance
- Backfill SQL populates existing records from PO history

Tests: 635 passing \(589 existing + 46 new\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Cross-platform foundation — GPS, fonts, DPI-aware sizing

Phase 2: Cross-Platform Foundation

GPS:
- New cross-platform GPS module \(utils/gps.py\) with Windows \(PowerShell\),
  macOS \(CoreLocation\), and Linux \(GeoClue2\) support
- Graceful fallback to manual coordinate entry on all platforms
- Replaced inline PowerShell code in clock_dialog.py and job_dialog.py
  with shared fetch_gps\(\) calls

Fonts:
- Platform-aware font selection \(utils/platform.py\): Segoe UI on
  Windows, .AppleSystemUIFont on macOS, Ubuntu/Noto Sans on Linux
- QSS templates use {{FONT_FAMILY}} placeholder resolved at runtime
- app.py uses get_primary_font_name\(\) for QFont initialization

DPI:
- Converted dialog-level setFixedSize\(\) to setMinimumSize\(\) for
  login, category, job assign, and truck dialogs

Tests: 671 passing \(635 + 36 new cross-platform tests\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Phase 3 — file-based cloud sync via user-selected folder

Add SyncManager for database synchronization between devices through
any shared folder \(Google Drive, OneDrive, Dropbox, local network\).
Each device exports/imports JSON sync files with last-write-wins merge
strategy, lock file management, and schema version checking. Config
additions: SYNC_ENABLED, SYNC_FOLDER_PATH, SYNC_INTERVAL_MINUTES,
DEVICE_ID \(auto-generated UUID\), LAST_SYNC_TIMESTAMP.

23 new tests — 694 total, all passing.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
